name: finabler
description: balenaBlock that provides a simple interface for controlling the balenaFin's coprocessor running the firmata protocol.

scripts.docker-dev: docker run -d -p 5000:5000 --restart=always --name registry registry:2 || true && docker buildx build -t localhost:5000/finabler:latest --platform linux/arm/v7 --file Dockerfile.template . && docker push localhost:5000/finabler:latest
scripts.docker-release: docker buildx build -t balenablocks/finabler:latest --platform linux/arm/v7 --file Dockerfile.template . && docker push balenablocks/finabler:latest

author: Alex Bucknall <alexbucknall@balena.io>
